sentences.english: Objective To study the application of laparoscopic surgery on high cryptorchidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹腔鏡在高位隱睾手術中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the applied value of Color Doppler ultrasound on cryptorchidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析彩色多普勒超聲在診斷隱睾症中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Boys were examined after birth for any signs of cryptorchidism.
sentences.chinese: 並對出生的男寶寶進行隱睾症症狀檢查。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the ideal operation method to cryptorchism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討治療隱睾症的理想術式。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of high frequency ultrasonography in the diagnosis of cryptorchidism .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻超聲對於隱睾症的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of laparoscope in the diagnosis and treatment of high cryptorchidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹腔鏡在高位隱睾診斷和治療中的價值。

sentences.english: Laparoscopy locates the position of impalpable testes and decides treatment options for them.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔鏡能夠確定未觸及隱睾的位置並決定手術方式。

sentences.english: The usual treatment of undescended testicles is surgery.
sentences.chinese: 隱睾症的常規治療是外科手術。
